import React from 'react' import '../Styles/Banner.css' import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import Banner1 from '../assets/banner1.jpg' import Banner12 from '../assets/banner1.2.png' import Banner2 from '../assets/banner2.jpg' import Banner22 from '../assets/banner2.2.png' export default function Banner(props) { const settings = { infinite: true, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000 } return (
) }
